newsitem.title: RUSSIA: SOCCER-HOLDERS LOKOMOTIV TO MEET DYNAMO IN FINAL.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HOLDERS LOKOMOTIV TO MEET DYNAMO IN FINAL.

text.p: Holders Lokomotiv Moscow booked themselves a place in the final of the Russian Cup when they beat Krylya Sovietov Samara 1-0 in the capital on Wednesday.
Alexander Smirnov took a pass from Vitaly Veselov in the 17th minute and fired home from the edge of the peanlty area.
Lokomotiv will take on city rivals Dynamo, 1-0 winners over Zenit St Petersburg in the first semifinal on Tuesday, in the June 11 final.
